info.title: Dinas PMD Katingan API Documentation
info.description:
RESTful API untuk Website Dinas Pemberdayaan Masyarakat dan Desa Kabupaten Katingan.
 *                   API ini menyediakan akses terhadap data berita, agenda, galeri, dokumen, dan struktur organisasi.

get.description: Returns paginated list of all news articles for admin with filters

post.description: Using POST method to support multipart/form-data

get.description: Returns paginated list of users (Admin only)

post.description: Create new user account (Super Admin only)

get.description: Returns user detail by ID (Admin only)

put.description: Reset password for specific user (Super Admin only)

post.description: Activate or deactivate user account (Admin only)

get.description: Returns paginated list of active agenda/events with optional date range filter
Returns detailed information of a specific agenda/event

post.description: Authenticate user and return API token for subsequent requests
Revoke all API tokens for current user

get.description: Returns current user information

put.description: Update name and email of current user
Change password for current authenticated user

get.description: Returns paginated list of active documents with optional filters
Returns detailed information of a specific document
Returns unique list of document categories

post.description: Increments the download count for a document

get.description: Returns paginated list of active gallery images with optional search filter
Returns detailed information of a specific gallery image
Returns contact information including address, phone, email, and social media
Returns organization's vision and mission statement
Returns active welcome message from head of office
Returns paginated list of published news articles
Returns single news article with full content
Returns complete organization structure grouped by hierarchy level
Returns detailed information of a specific organization member
Returns statistics including total news, events, galleries, documents, and organization members
Returns detailed news statistics including published and draft counts
Returns detailed document statistics by category and most downloaded documents

sanctum.description: Enter your Bearer token obtained from login endpoint

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Endpoints untuk login, logout, dan autentikasi

tags.name: User Management
tags.description: Endpoints untuk kelola akun admin (Super Admin only)
